Title: Faculty Research Interests : Greg Morrisett
Body: Teaching CS 611: Semantics of Programming Languages (Fall 1996) CS 512: Advanced Language Implementation (Spring 1996) Selected Papers Semantics of Memory Management for Polymorphic Languages , Greg Morrisett and Robert Harper , CMU Technical Report CMU-CS-96-176 [Also appears as CMU-CS-FOX-96-04], September, 1996.
